org.apache.flink.runtime.clusterframework

类 BootstrapTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.clusterframework.BootstrapTools

  • public class BootstrapTools
extends Object
    Tools for starting JobManager and TaskManager processes, including the Actor Systems used to run the JobManager and TaskManager actors.

    • 方法概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • startActorSystem

        public static akka.actor.ActorSystem startActorSystem(org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration configuration,
                                                      String listeningAddress,
                                                      String portRangeDefinition,
                                                      org.slf4j.Logger logger)
                                               throws Exception
        Starts an ActorSystem with the given configuration listening at the address/ports.
        参数:
        configuration - The Flink configuration
        listeningAddress - The address to listen at.
        portRangeDefinition - The port range to choose a port from.
        logger - The logger to output log information.
        返回:
        The ActorSystem which has been started
        抛出:
        Exception

      • startActorSystem

        public static akka.actor.ActorSystem startActorSystem(org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration configuration,
                                                      String listeningAddress,
                                                      int listeningPort,
                                                      org.slf4j.Logger logger)
                                               throws Exception
        Starts an Actor System at a specific port.
        参数:
        configuration - The Flink configuration.
        listeningAddress - The address to listen at.
        listeningPort - The port to listen at.
        logger - the logger to output log information.
        返回:
        The ActorSystem which has been started.
        抛出:
        Exception

      • startWebMonitorIfConfigured

        public static WebMonitor startWebMonitorIfConfigured(org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration config,
                                                     akka.actor.ActorSystem actorSystem,
                                                     akka.actor.ActorRef jobManager,
                                                     org.slf4j.Logger logger)
                                              throws Exception
        Starts the web frontend.
        参数:
        config - The Flink config.
        actorSystem - The ActorSystem to start the web frontend in.
        logger - Logger for log output
        返回:
        WebMonitor instance.
        抛出:
        Exception

      • generateTaskManagerConfiguration

        public static org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration generateTaskManagerConfiguration(org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration baseConfig,
                                                                                            String jobManagerHostname,
                                                                                            int jobManagerPort,
                                                                                            int numSlots,
                                                                                            scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration registrationTimeout)
        Generate a task manager configuration.
        参数:
        baseConfig - Config to start from.
        jobManagerHostname - Job manager host name.
        jobManagerPort - Port of the job manager.
        numSlots - Number of slots to configure.
        registrationTimeout - Timeout for registration
        返回:
        TaskManager configuration

      • writeConfiguration

                                      File file)
                               throws IOException
        Writes a Flink YAML config file from a Flink Configuration object.
        参数:
        cfg - The Flink config
        file - The File to write to
        抛出:
        IOException

      • substituteDeprecatedConfigKey

        public static void substituteDeprecatedConfigKey(org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration config,
                                                 String deprecated,
                                                 String designated)
        Sets the value of a new config key to the value of a deprecated config key.
        参数:
        config - Config to write
        deprecated - The old config key
        designated - The new config key

      • substituteDeprecatedConfigPrefix

        public static void substituteDeprecatedConfigPrefix(org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration config,
                                                    String deprecatedPrefix,
                                                    String designatedPrefix)
        Sets the value of of a new config key to the value of a deprecated config key. Taking into account the changed prefix.
        参数:
        config - Config to write
        deprecatedPrefix - Old prefix of key
        designatedPrefix - New prefix of key

      • getTaskManagerShellCommand

        public static String getTaskManagerShellCommand(org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration flinkConfig,
                                                ContaineredTaskManagerParameters tmParams,
                                                String configDirectory,
                                                String logDirectory,
                                                boolean hasLogback,
                                                boolean hasLog4j,
                                                Class<?> mainClass)
        Generates the shell command to start a task manager.
        参数:
        flinkConfig - The Flink configuration.
        tmParams - Paramaters for the task manager.
        configDirectory - The configuration directory for the flink-conf.yaml
        logDirectory - The log directory.
        hasLogback - Uses logback?
        hasLog4j - Uses log4j?
        mainClass - The main class to start with.
        返回:
        A String containing the task manager startup command.
